name: Vortexa
desc: Imports, exports, flows and floating storage of Crude Oil (at the grade level), Gasoline, Diesel, BioDiesel, Jet Fuel, Gasoil, Blending Components, Naphtha, VGO, Asphalt/Bitumen and Fuel Oil.
full_ticker_coverage: Crude oil, Refined Products (historical, live and forecast) - imports, exports and flows. Floating storage and freight.
sectors: China, Energy, Financial Services, Industrials, Software (SaaS)
why_us?: Identifying physical and financial trading opportunities in the energy markets
advantages: Largest real-time coverage of refined products globally
use_cases: Supply and demand imbalances that create trading opportunities
